quest.name: Getting into Gear
journal:
 Quest Sync
Tazel Meyean the Lettered has need of a versatile adventurer to reclaim stolen materials and craft them into balloon components.
※The crafting portion of this quest is recommended for Disciples of the Hand level 10 and above, and the battle portion for Disciples of War or Magic level 47 and above.

Tazel Meyean had intended to ask you to craft high-quality transmission components for the Dezul Qualan. Alas, the materials required for their synthesis have been stolen by a band of Qiqirn. Speak with Miah Molkot at Eugenia's Spire to learn where the vile vermin may have fled.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.

Miah Molkot informs you that the Qiqirn fled north of the spire after ransacking the Ixali caravan. Make your way to Proud Creek, and reclaim the materials from three of the pesky pests─by force if necessary.
You have reclaimed three sets of transmission component materials. Present them to Hildeyerd at the Bobbing Cork in order to gain access to the crafting facility under her care.

Hildeyerd has prepared the crafting facility for your use. With the materials you have obtained, synthesize two high-quality transmission components, and deliver them to Tazel Meyean at Ehcatl.

※In the event that the status Facility Access: Detailing wears off or the synthesis ends in failure, you may try again by speaking with Hildeyerd.

You have delivered the transmission components to Tazel Meyean, who squawks in sheer delight. The Ixal expresses his gratitude and admiration for you. Amidst the centuries-old conflict between man and Ixal, your friendship with the Ehcatl Nine is a shining star of hope for peace and understanding.
objectives: Speak with Miah Molkot at Eugenia's Spire.
Speak with Qiqirn rats at Proud Creek, and take back the transmission component materials by force.
Present the transmission component materials to Hildeyerd at Fallgourd Float.
Synthesize transmission components Deliver the transmission components to Tazel Meyean the Lettered.

dialogue.name: TAZELMEYEAN
dialogue.text: Squawk! Dreadful, it is! Materials stolen by thieves!

dialogue.name: TAZELMEYEAN
dialogue.text: To be used in transmission unit, they were─shafts for transferring power to wings. Without them, take to skies, vessel cannot. Remain grounded, dreams of Ehcatl Nine will.

dialogue.name: TAZELMEYEAN
dialogue.text: To be used in transmission unit, they were─low-friction coating for driveshaft. Without it, smooth transfer of power, impossible is. Remain grounded, dreams of Ehcatl Nine will.

dialogue.name: TAZELMEYEAN
dialogue.text: To be used in transmission unit, they were─joints for driveshaft. Without them, be mounted onto vessel, driveshaft cannot. Remain grounded, dreams of Ehcatl Nine will.

dialogue.name: TAZELMEYEAN
dialogue.text: Being borne by caravan, materials were. Ransacked by Qiqirn rats, caravan was. Information on vile vermin, Miah Molkot will have. Find her at Eugenia's Spire, you will.

dialogue.name: TAZELMEYEAN
dialogue.text: Alas, scourge of Ixal, that feral feline is. Go within hundred paces of her, we dare not. Track down and reclaim materials in our stead, you must. When materials, you have, use crafting facility at Fallgourd to make transmission components, you can.

dialogue.name: TAZELMEYEAN
dialogue.text: Information on Qiqirn rats, Miah Molkot will have. Track down and reclaim materials in our stead, you must. When materials, you have, use crafting facility at Fallgourd to make transmission components, you must.

dialogue.name: MIAHMOLKOT
dialogue.text: You seek Miah Molkot, great bane of the birdmen? I am she. How might I serve you, adventurer? Caught sight of little birdies that want for feathering, mayhap?

dialogue.name: MIAHMOLKOT
dialogue.text: ...The Qiqirn rats that ransacked an Ixali caravan? Reports say they fled north of here after the deed was done. Why do you ask?

dialogue.name: MIAHMOLKOT
dialogue.text: ...You don't mean to reclaim the stolen wares for the Ixal, do you? But of course not. You asked about the Qiqirn out of curiosity...right? Right!

dialogue.name: MIAHMOLKOT
dialogue.text: After ransacking the Ixali caravan, the Qiqirn rats fled north of here. I will assume you asked about them out of curiosity, not because you mean to help the sworn enemy of Gridania. Carry on, then.

dialogue.name: KIKIROON1
dialogue.text: Good loots! Good loots sell good! Sell for many sparklies!

dialogue.name: KIKIROON1
dialogue.text: Squeeeak!? My loots is mine! Get dirty man-hands off my loots!

dialogue.name: KIKIROON2
dialogue.text: Loots become sparklies! Sparklies become tasty chicken egg!

dialogue.name: KIKIROON2
dialogue.text: Squeeeak! Friend of bird!? Kill ambusher! Make ambusher dead!

dialogue.name: KIKIROON3
dialogue.text: So little loots... Me want more loots...

dialogue.name: KIKIROON3
dialogue.text: Squeeeak! You come to loot my loots!? Me loot your loots!

dialogue.name: POP
dialogue.text: You're under rat attack!

dialogue.name: HILDEYERD
dialogue.text: Hello again, adventurer! Come to avail yourself of our fine facility, I take it? Let's have a look at the materials you've brought.

dialogue.name: HILDEYERD
dialogue.text: Ooh, yet another curious collection of odds and ends, and a goodly amount besides. So that they don't get in your way while you work, I'll hold on to any excess materials until you need them. The crafting space is ready for your use. You may begin whenever you like.

dialogue.name: HILDEYERD
dialogue.text: Remember, I'm holding on to the excess materials. If the synthesis doesn't go well and you have need of them, you need but ask me.

dialogue.name: HILDEYERD
dialogue.text: Finished crafting, have you? Well, don't keep the client waiting─run along and deliver your handiwork! Now, I doubt that you'd be so clumsy as to misplace your precious creations, but on the off chance that you do, know that I still have the excess materials in my keeping.

dialogue.name: TAZELMEYEAN
dialogue.text: Featherless one, I hail. Materials taken by Qiqirn, you have recovered? With them, transmission components of finest finish, you have made?

dialogue.name: TAZELMEYEAN
dialogue.text: Squawk! Sublime components, missing materials have become! Take to high heavens, dreams of Ehcatl Nine will!

dialogue.name: TAZELMEYEAN
dialogue.text: Good and noble heart, featherless one has. Unique among your kind, you are. Much and more to life than bloodletting, there is.

dialogue.name: POPMESSAGE
dialogue.text: You now have access to the crafting facility.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.
